group_1.textCenter: (…Lady San’s legs, Lady San’s legs, Lady San’s@legs, Lady San’s legs…)
(Urgh… No good, no good. I’m still too nervous…)
(I wanna win…but I need to get out of here…)
(Lady San gave me lots of advice.)
(‘Cause every time I look at the legs in front of me- every time I think about it- my heart starts racing!)
(Aah, jeez…! I’m a disgrace, I’m scared…)
(I can’t- I can’t stay conscious anymore…)

group_1.textRight: It’s nice to meet you, Miyuri Yukari.

group_1.textLeft: Huh..?

group_1.textRight: You seem to be in a predicament.

group_1.textLeft: Um… uh…?

group_1.textRight: I want you to make a contract with me and@become a Magical Girl.
You’ll be able to solve whatever is troubling you if@you do.

group_1.textLeft: Wh-wh-wh-what the- what the-?! A talking white@tanuki!
Have I- have I gotten so nervous that now I’m hallucinating…?!

group_1.textRight: This isn’t a hallucination or a dream. This is real.

group_1.textLeft: O-okay, fine! A scam, I bet this is a scam!
Or some kinda new hidden camera prank!

group_1.textRight: You have what it takes to become a Magical Girl.
In exchange for making a contract,
I’ll grant you any wish you want.

group_1.textLeft: *huff*… *pant*… M-my wish…?
I have a bunch of them!
All I- all I wanna do is enjoy the contest.
I want to have fun, compete, and win.
Or, really, I don’t even care if I win or not!
I just wanna be able to skate like everyone else.
That’s all I want. That’s all I want…!

group_1.textRight: so you’re worried about getting anxious in front@of others?

group_1.textLeft: There’s more to it than that!
There’s my social anxiety, leg fetish, and@everything- everything in between!
I don’t have anxiety because I LIKE it!
And I didn’t CHOOSE to end up with a leg fetish!
I’m not different from everyone else because I@WANT to be!
Why- why can’t I just be normal…?
Even though Lady San did her best to help me…
There’s no way I could ever face her again like@this!

group_1.textRight: I can help you with your problems.

group_1.textLeft: Huh…?

group_1.textRight: No matter what your wish is, I can make it come@true.

group_1.textCenter: I wanna win… I really wanna win…but I’m so@nervous…
